translation:
Most Illustrious Sir,

Enclosed are the named Colonels Joaquim Pedro and José Mariano de Matos, along with a captain and a soldier; immediately, Your Excellency Antônio Manuel do Amaral went to the town of Jaguarão to plunder with 150 men and was repelled by the Jaguarão police, supported by infantry and navy, resulting in the death of Amaral himself, a lieutenant and 5 or 6 soldiers, and injuries to a lieutenant and 6 soldiers; on our side, we regret a sergeant killed; this is reported to me by the same captain who is imprisoned, who was present during the attack; as of now, I have not received official news; if the men from the 2nd Corps who remained to bring armaments have not yet departed, Your Excellency Canguçu.

God keep Your Excellency

Campo nas Pontas de Piratini, June 28, 1844.

Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira  
Lieutenant-Colonel Commander of the Garrison of the city of Pelotas  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu
